author: Sean Walker
title: Lions' Ansah shows off marketing chops in pizza ad
text:
Sean Walker | Posted Sep 30th, 2015 @ 8:41pm 
— Former BYU defensive lineman Ezekial "Ziggy" Ansah earned a bachelor's degree in actuarial science with a math minor from BYU, but he showed off his marketing skills in a recent television ad for a national pizza chain. 
The native of Accra, Ghana who came to BYU on a track scholarship and finished with 13 tackles for loss and 4.5 sacks in three years with the football team has now also signed a few endorsement deals as a member of the Detroit Lions. 
Ansah took some time away from his gig with the Lions to film a commercial for national pizza chain "Hungry Howie's," and he seems to have impressed the guys at "Hungry Howie's ad agency" in the 30-second spot. 
We've covered Ansah at KSL Sports since he struggled to put on his pads at BYU , and — while he is an intelligent mind and gifted athlete — we're not sure he has the marketing chops to compete in this industry. 
Look at the way he handles this doubter in the video below. 

Rod Zundel
